thread.title_full: BULK POWDERS™ recensione scritta da RDS

author: RDS
title: RDS
text: After long research, i have found this product, as i don't like sweet or any flawer in test i choose aroma and has very good test, just one mistake i had made i took milk powder, its not the problem of product but its my problem with milk, so next time i take different but always bulk product, one of the best product ever had, in few days i can see the difference in my body. Thanks alot , higly recommend who are looking for good working product.
